price: E, com efeito, fizemo-lo ver todos Nossos sinais; mas, ele os desmentiu e os recusou.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walaqad araynāhu āyātinā kullahā fakadhaba wa-abā
